channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Stop the presses: Dyson discounts the Gen5Outsize after Black Friday by 52% – now just AU$799
item.description: Who knew our favourite Black Friday deal would come on December 2? Get in quick to grab one of Dyson's two most premium stick vacuums at half price.

item.title: Here are 50+ Cyber Monday deals you can still get for $100 or less
item.description: When the deals are flying fast and furious, it can be easy to overspend, especially when OLED TVs, laptops, and other great pieces of tech are cheaper than they’ve ever been. You don’t have to spend a lot to find gift-worthy deals, though. If you’re working with a tighter budget, we’ve found plenty of gadgets […]

item.title: We found 45 of the best last-minute Cyber Monday deals under $30
item.description: One of the pitfalls of Cyber Monday is getting overwhelmed by deep discounts on premium gadgets. After all, who wouldn’t want to save hundreds, if not thousands, of dollars on a high-end gaming laptop or a spiffy OLED TV? But these luxury items, while great, can still easily set you back three or four figures. Luckily, […]

item.title: I'd buy this Galaxy S25 Ultra deal in a heartbeat, even though the Galaxy S26 Ultra is almost here
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra is down to an all-time low, and even though the Galaxy S26 Ultra is right around the corner, this deal is worth buying because this phone has staying power.

item.title: These great Cyber Monday tech deals will likely be gone tomorrow
item.description: December is kicking off with a bang. Cyber Monday is today, and it’s one of your last chances to score major deals before the holiday rush plows us all over. It’s a great moment to snag gadgets — many of which have been tested by The Verge — at (or close to) all-time lows if […]

item.title: Galaxy Z Trifold : Samsung plie le jeu (deux fois) avec son nouveau smartphone de 10 pouces
item.description: Surprise ! Samsung a présenté cette nuit ce qui sera sans doute son dernier smartphone de l'année, le Galaxy Z Trifold. Si ce nom vous rappelle quelque chose, quoi de plus normal : la rumeur court depuis des mois sur cet appareil à deux charnières qui dévoile un écran digne d'une grande tablette.

item.title: NYT Pips hints, answers for December 2, 2025
item.description: The New York Times' latest game, Pips, brings domino fun to your desktop. How to play Pips as well as hints in case you get stuck.

item.title: NYT Connections Sports Edition today: Hints and answers for December 2, 2025
item.description: Connections: Sports Edition is a New York Times word game about finding common sports threads between words. How to solve the day's puzzle.

item.title: NYT Connections hints today: Clues, answers for December 2, 2025
item.description: Connections is a New York Times word game that's all about finding the "common threads between words." How to solve the puzzle.

item.title: NYT Strands hints, answers for December 2, 2025
item.description: The NYT Strands hints and answers you need to make the most of your puzzling experience.

item.title: Wordle today: Answer, hints for December 2, 2025
item.description: Here's the answer for "Wordle" #1626 on December 2 as well as a few hints, tips, and clues to help you solve it yourself.

item.title: Last call for Cyber Monday TV deals – the best offers still available on Samsung, LG, Hisense, TCL, and more
item.description: Cyber Monday is coming to a quick close, but there's still time to grab an exceptional TV deal.

item.title: Act fast – this Anker 65W charger is a steal in Cyber Monday's final hours
item.description: An Anker charger is such a handy device, and at this price for Cyber Monday it's a no-brainer.

item.title: Last call on Cyber Monday 2025: Live updates from Amazon, Apple, Best Buy, Walmart, and more
item.description: Get live updates on Cyber Monday sales as we near the closing bell. We found last-chance savings of $1,000 on Samsung TVs and record prices on AirPods.

item.title: Hoto’s slick, rechargeable tools are still over 60 percent off for Cyber Monday
item.description: Hoto makes some of our favorite tools, the kind that are not only functional but also look great. And thanks to an ongoing Cyber Monday promotion, you can save on the company’s products through the end of today, December 1st, allowing you to grab an electric screwdriver or a great starter tool set for tackling […]

item.title: 25 Cyber Monday deals better than Black Friday, including Samsungs The Frame, MacBooks, and more
item.description: It's your last chance to shop 25 products with Cyber Monday deals better than their Black Friday discounts, including a Samsung The Frame TV, the M4 Apple MacBook Air, and Bose headphones.

item.title: Quick! Grab the most comfortable headphones I’ve ever tested for 43% less this Cyber Monday
item.description: These excellent cheap headphones offer tons of comfort, ANC, and great sound, and now they're 43% off for Cyber Monday.

item.title: Last call: You can still secure 1 year of HBO Max for $2.99/month before Cyber Monday ends
item.description: A Cyber Monday deal gets you a year of HBO Max for just $2.99 per month, down from $10.99 per month. This deal ends Dec. 1.

item.title: We love the Bose SoundLink Plus speaker, and now its $90 off for Cyber Monday
item.description: Cyber Monday is coming to a close. Hurry and grab the Bose SoundLink Plus speaker for $179 while it's on sale at Amazon.

item.title: Amazon Cyber Monday ends tonight! See 180+ last-chance deals on Bose headphones, Switch 2 bundles, and Ninja air fryers
item.description: Amazon Cyber Monday 2025 deals end soon, but you can still buy Fire TVs starting at $99, Kindles starting at $79.99, and save $300 on Samsung TVs.

item.title: Expert-picked Cyber Monday deals: This is your last chance to save on AirPods, Kindles, Legos, and PS5 consoles
item.description: The best Cyber Monday deals of 2025 save you $250 on MacBooks, 27% on Kindles, and 30% on Legos. Shop while sales are still live.

item.title: I test hi-fi systems and if you buy just one thing this Cyber Monday, make it this sexy Sony Bluetooth turntable
item.description: I've loved this deck since it arrived in 2019, and at this price it's hands-down my hi-fi buy of Cyber Monday.

item.title: Looking for workout headphones? I'd buy the Beats Powerbeats Pro 2 over the AirPods Pro 3 in the Cyber Monday sales
item.description: Beats Powerbeats Pro 2 have the same heart rate tracking feature and audio chip as the AirPods Pro 3, but they're $20 cheaper for Cyber Monday.

item.title: If you buy one more thing on Cyber Monday, buy your parents the Aura digital picture frame while its $40 off
item.description: The Aura Carver Digital Picture Frame is on sale at Amazon during Cyber Monday for $139, down from the list price of $179. That's a 22% discount.

item.title: Govee’s latest RGB-equipped speaker is 25 percent off for Cyber Monday
item.description: Whether you’re looking to liven up an upcoming holiday party or pick up a gift that will literally brighten your loved one’s day, Govee’s Table Lamp 2 Pro X Sound by JBL is a great option. It normally retails for $179.99; however, for Cyber Monday, the hybrid gadget is on sale for a new low […]
